name: Reaper's Holiday
description:
You play as temp cover for the Grim Reaper as souls pop up in the Garden of the Damned. Sensing an opportunity, four copyright dodging ghosts appear and try to steal the souls away!

In 20 second rounds collect more souls than the ghosts can.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move 

This was made for LD52 which had the theme 'Harvest'. 

Art pack from: https://dyariko.itch.io/arpg-1bit-topdown

SoundFX from: a random website I have since lost but it's got something to do with RetroFX

Music from: OpenGameArt (links to come here)

---

I've never done a jam before properly because I always get frustrated at creating something that I find doesn't satisfy me. It's so easy to make something that doesn't feel like a coherent experience or like it wasn't designed in anyway and I wanted to casually do this one (i.e. not lose my whole weekend) and try to create something that felt like a coherent piece of work with a cool theme.

Hope you like it I had a lot of fun making it!
